text: @realDonaldTrump Over 108,000 dead Americans🇺🇲 from coronavirus with experts citing your delayed response costing 10,000s of lives. That number is increasing📈still, and you're gloating about the stock market rising? So insecure. So sad. Thank God your stock📉is falling. #Biden2020 #OneTermTrump https://t.co/ZiZyDo1Joj
